abstract: At Home Depot‘s annual meeting yesterday, investors and management went back and forth on a range of issues as the specter of Robert L. Nardelli, the company’s ousted chief executive, continued to haunt the proceedings.
lead_paragraph: At Home Depot‘s annual meeting yesterday, investors and management went back and forth on a range of issues as the specter of Robert L. Nardelli, the company’s ousted chief executive, continued to haunt the proceedings.

headline.main: Apologetic, Home Depot Tries to Move Beyond Nardelli’s Shadow
